dct_title_s: Carte geologique detaillee de la France [a 1/80 000]: Lyon
dct_description_sm: France. Service de la carte geologique de France North Decimal Degree 45.8816 South Decimal Degree 45.5217 East Decimal Degree 5.2233 West Decimal Degree 4.3991 Relief shown by hachures. Principal meridian: Paris. Longitude is given in centesimal values (100 grades = 90 degrees) .The Service de la carte geologique de la France was integrated to the BRGM to become the only France Service geologique national. Based on "Carte topograqphique de l'etat major."
dct_publisher_sm: Orléans : Bureau de recherches géogiques et minières, 1922.
Paris : Service de la carte géologique, 1922.
